Summary: i was shown a wierd object and was told not to touch it or it could cause "us"all to die
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around July 15th 1992
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI "myself" along side of my own family members has had strange encounters and strange happenings take place in our house (every house we moved too they followed)..Ok my first encounter that i remember is when i was a young girl of the age 11-12 yrs old,(im 28 now) anyways i was in my bedroom in my bed in a drifty sleep stage and fell asleep,i was awoken by tapping on the outside of my bedroom window, i looked out and seen this glowish grey like misty figure it called to me to follow it, when i stepped up from off my bed i was already transported to the out side somehow. anyways it motioned for me to follow and directly called me to hurry, i went to take a step towards it , it zoomed darted off and transported me to a empty field, where there was a group of these grey like figures small like the size of a 1 yr old child but there was one that was a bit taller then the others, they told me things and showed me this huge hovering trianglar symbol with a revolving square( cube ) everything was transparent and glowing) and inside the square was a circler ball pulseing , it was very odd cause the whole thing was moving in a odd like rhythem, the ball was rotating inside the square, and the square was rotating inside the triangle , i can also remember i wanted to touch it but the grey figures said in a loud voice not to touch it or "we" all would die, it is not the time but you are choosen to ( but i cant remember) what else .. ... after that i seen them appear from time to time as if they are checking in on me, and letting me know that they are there..is there anyone here that had a experince like this following the hovering triangle with a square in it and a circle ball in the square ( or anything to do with these 3 shapes???) i would really like to know..if anyone is out there like me..? I would really like to hear if anyone has any idea what this object could be...... someone mentioned that it could be some kind of reactor.....??
